title: What a fail of an april fool's joke
body:
Like, "Oh, you really got me there, rito! For a second I thought the free week rotation was going to be all Draven!" No, no I didn't....because you put the real one right next to it.

http://i.imgur.com/ETvLhxV.jpg

Edit: Ok, so I just played a game. While I think the champion rotation thing was still an epic fail, I did laugh at the Draven masks lol.

Edit #2: OMG THE MINIONS HAVE THEM TOO LOLOL

replies.body: Yeah, I thought that would have actually been funny. This stupid "lmao everyone has Draven heads xD" thing isn't.

I mean, it might have been a lil funny if the free week rotation ACTUALLY was Draven.

But everyone is wearing a Draven head? I haven't played a game because I'm studying lol.

> [{quoted}](name=PDE5 Inhib,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WoKEdfcf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-01T10:39:45.220+0000)
>
> I mean, it might have been a lil funny if the free week rotation ACTUALLY was Draven.
> 
> But everyone is wearing a Draven head? I haven't played a game because I'm studying lol.

in aram and normals they are
patch came still no draveeeeeeeeeeeeen heads in eune-.-
only works in ARAM, Twisted Treeline, and Blind Pick Summoner's Rift. They still want people to be able to play Ranked and Normals without the distraction.
Which is a shame, because I can't play blind pick without having to do a role I suck at. But I wanna see Draven heads :[
Idk about you but it cracks me up every time I see a non-humanoid champion with Draven's head plastered over it looking all derpy for about 3 seconds.
Mega Gnar had amazing hair  =P
I just bought Skarner.nuff said
The Draven heads are just annoying :(
the heads make the game unplayable, it's massively distracting. Nice joke rito, hope you find it funny because no one playing with this garbage does.

Well that's probably why it's not in ranked matches.

However, this post was not about the Draven heads. It was about their site (and client) showing the free week rotation was all Draven...but right next to it they had the actual free week champs. The joke was just awful because it's not believable in the slightest since they give the joke away before even starting it...it's not even a joke lol.

> [{quoted}](name=HelpmeSenpai,realm=OCE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WoKEdfcf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-01T12:07:56.820+0000)
>
> the heads make the game unplayable, it's massively distracting. Nice joke rito, hope you find it funny because no one playing with this garbage does.

I actually find it quite funny.
Let your hair down mate it's a fucking joke, no one who gets pranked ever finds the prank funny.

> [{quoted}](name=Deaeras,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WoKEdfcf,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2016-04-01T17:19:04.488+0000)
>
> I actually find it quite funny.
> Let your hair down mate it's a fucking joke, no one who gets pranked ever finds the prank funny.

If a prank is actually good then yes you are supposed to find it funny. But I don't see the humour in a billion dollar company fucking around with a players ability to actually play the game.
Dude, you're from OCE. Not like the level of play is high enough that a Draven head is going to ruin it. We could play blindfolded and beat your region easier than bots. Bye Felicia.
That was uncalled for. His opinion is ridiculous, but bringing region into it was unnecessary.

PDE's posts are more reasonable than thinking a company making it's consumer base angry is good practice. 

He at least is just trolling, what's your excuse.

> [{quoted}](name=HelpmeSenpai,realm=OCE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WoKEdfcf,comment-id=000100020000000200000001,timestamp=2016-04-02T16:15:02.530+0000)
>
> PDE's posts are more reasonable than thinking a company making it's consumer base angry is good practice. 
> 
> He at least is just trolling, what's your excuse.

actually, going through his posts most of them are rational points given in a crass manner. I approve, if you can only focus on your widdle feewings and ignore any point made then you really did not care about the point to begin with. 
Gonna ride him a little more, him and gayfluffyunicorn have been among the few posters with any part of them grounded in reality so far.

Thanks to some random guy replying to a comment a couple posts below this, I just now saw your comment.

Thanks for the appreciation ;) ...if of course you're using crass as "insensitive" and not "lacking intelligence" lol.
What part do you approve, his trolling or him making observations. I'm not entirely sure what point you are referring to.
How are you not boardsbanned yet.
For what?
No one who waits a year for his favourite game mode to come out finds it funny either..
So...go play outside instead?
whats ''outside''...?
Just play ranked or normal draft instead.
Should be mirror mode where everyone IS Draven. 10 Dravens in a game. Like wtf Riot you can't think of such simple things to make this at least fun?
That's literally what I thought it was going to be...I thought that was the joke. Until I saw the real free week champion rotation right next to it and was like "wut?"

I'm going to guess you're 12.
guess again
11? Or a business major. 1 of those 3. If you say no, you're lying.
+1 For the business major joke.
I am a strong independent black woman.
Karma who?

and this is why I hate urf fans

> [{quoted}](name=gabinator1000,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WoKEdfcf,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2016-04-01T16:21:26.104+0000)
>
> and this is why I hate urf fans

That and they think the mode is actually the greatest thing since the wheel.
"HAR HAR HAR I CAN PLAY HERC AND GET A PENTA IN SECONDS" While the team who is getting anally fucked but him can't do shit
I think it's funny.
I wasn't talking about the masks...I was talking about the failed "free week champ rotation".
At least it has {{champion:119}} in it.
I wasn't even thinking it would be an actual skin... I was just expecting it to be the texture that gets used if you play draven in one of the draven head game modes.
Honestly the draven masks just become irrelevant at best and irksome at worst after a couple games.
It was hilarious the first game. I would imagine it would get annoying after a couple games though.

after 1 minute*
and not even then, they annoyed me from the start 
it was so distracting and practically impossible to play
Draven is a fine champ, but every champ with his face. Sorry. Won't play until this mod is over. Really want to swear.. though
Bring back urf
luuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuv ur icon
